A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was afraid thst this movie would take characters in the wrong direction but I am very satisfied with the general direction and character development that we see. Its not overly political either which some say but i do not agree. Rian uses the characters invented for episode 7 in a good way and creates a few new\, great ones\, and they arent ONLY female or male or diverse just to be diverse. They are absolutely SPOT-ON and thats that. An overall terrific experience for anyone but especially for me as a super-fan of Star Wars!
